name: Textarea
description: A multi-line text input component with auto-resize support for longer text entry

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a multi-line text input with label. Error messages are announced via aria-describedby.

recommendedUsage: Use for multi-line text entry such as comments, descriptions, or messages. Pair with labels and helper text.
antiPatterns: Do not use for single-line text - use Input component instead. Always provide a visible or accessible label.
